thread.title: Lewandowski reaches a century of Bayern Munich goals
thread.title_full: Lewandowski reaches a century of Bayern Munich goals

title: Lewandowski reaches a century of Bayern Munich goals
text:
Lewandowski reaches a century of Bayern Munich goals Getty Images 0 11-Mar-2017 21:35:56 The prolific Poland international striker recorded his 100th effort for the German giants during a Bundeliga meeting with Eintract Frankfurt 
Robert Lewandowski has notched his 100th goal for Bayern Munich, in just his 136th appearance for the club. 
The prolific Poland international striker reached his century during a Bundesliga meeting with Eintract Frankfurt. 
Stars that could break Pogba's fee 
Lewandowski opened the scoring in that contest in the 38th minute before adding his second, and Bayern’s third, 10 minutes into the second half. 
It was that strike which took him to a notable career landmark and enhanced his reputation as one of the finest frontmen in the business. — FC Bayern English (@FCBayernEN) March 11, 2017 
Lewandowski joined Bayern from Borussia Dortmund in the summer of 2014. 
He opened his goal account in his third appearance for the club, in a 1-1 draw with Schalke on August 30. 
Alonso should go down as a great 
A debut campaign at the Allianz Arena delivered 25 goals, with that tally improved to 42 last season. 
He now has 33 in just 36 appearances this term, with his contribution helping to keep Bayern in the hunt for another historic treble. Related
